name: Miner Meltdown (itch)
description:
An action-packed 4v4 multiplayer game for Windows and Mac.

Scour the map for minerals, upgrade your gear, and blow up the opposing team all the while avoiding monsters, traps, and environmental pitfalls along the way. Maps are randomly generated and 100% destructible, so every match is a fully unique, fast-paced, and chaotic affair.

Features:

  • 4 vs 4 online multiplayer.
  • Randomly generated and 100% destructible terrain.
  • Over 20 unique weapons and gadgets to choose from.
  • Fast-paced gameplay using ropes and jetpacks to move around the map with ease.
  • Unlock new skins and weapons by leveling up.
  • Bots, so you can play online or solo.
  • "Deathmatch", "Crazy King", & "Diamond Dash" game-types.
  • Tons of thrust-dancing.

If you have questions or feedback, I'd love to hear from you!
